rules_text:
When Acquisitions Expert enters, search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Vigilance
Martial Expert gets +2/+2 as long as you've cast an Equipment spell or activated an equip ability this turn.
